sqlMap.select: SELECT mem_id,mem_pass,mem_name,mem_regno1, mem_regno2, TO_CHAR(mem_bir,'YYYY-MM-DD') mem_bir,mem_zip,mem_add1, mem_add2, mem_hometel,mem_comtel,mem_hp, mem_mail,mem_job, mem_like,mem_memorial, TO_CHAR(mem_memorialday,'YYYY-MM-DD') mem_memorialday,mem_mileage,mem_delete FROM member where mem_id = #aa#
